Header.name: TokarCompany — a manufacturing and construction company

hero.title: We manufacture and install various types of buildings in Ukraine
hero.subtitle: We will build a house, restaurant, sauna, gazebo, barbecue area or any other structure tailored to your individual request

why_us.title: Why choose us:
why_us.card4_desc: On average, completed in X days from foundation to commissioning

catalog.title: Project catalog
catalog.living_desc: Section with houses, cottages, villas, estates and mansions
catalog.commercial_desc: Section with resorts, hotels, restaurants, cafes and shops
catalog.garden_desc: Section with saunas, gazebos, pergolas, garages, kitchens, playgrounds and barbecue areas

composition.title: What our buildings consist of
composition.step1_desc: This is a visualization of the building through the device screen. The model is created individually for the client. The main task of 3D visualization is to consider all details and show the final look of the project using real materials and proportions.
composition.step2_desc: We come to the site, discuss the task, identify the client's needs and take measurements. We build the supporting structure that can withstand loads and weather conditions.
composition.step3_desc: At one of our 4 plants across Ukraine we manufacture the structure according to the technical specifications agreed with you.
composition.step4_desc: We perform the full range of work: from foundation construction to roofing. The building will be ready for use upon completion.

articles.title: Latest articles
articles.article1_title: Ready-made country house or build your own?
articles.article1_desc: To buy or build a house from scratch is an inevitable question when choosing private real estate outside the city.
articles.article2_title: Author house projects – why exclusivity is more profitable
articles.article2_desc: The owner has to decide: choose a standard ready-made project or order an individual one.
articles.article3_title: Beautiful houses: 100+ photos of the best projects
articles.article3_desc: Modern low-rise construction in Ukraine is represented by popular standard architectural solutions.
